# Packages required for the validation (update requirements on the 2023-03-02)

arrow
covidcast
cowplot
data.table

ggplot2
ggpubr
gh
glue
grDevices
grid
gridExtra
gtable
lubridate
purrr
readr
remotes
scales
stringr
tibble
tidyr
tidyselect
